Comment.val: /*Function created as a replacement for all write actions on the transaction table in EP+. 1 = conversion of relations (pi-_relationNumberOld,pi-_relationNumberNew) 2 = conversion of accounts (pi-_relationNumberOld,pi-_accountOld,pi-_accountNew,pi-_accountTypeOld,pi-_(account)CurrencyOld) 3 = conversion of acting as (pi-_actingAsOld,pi-_actingAsNew) 4 = conversion of accountType (pi-_relationNumberOld,pi-_relationNumberNew,pi-_accountOld,pi-_accountTypeOld,pi-_accountTypeNew,pi-_(account)CurrencyOld) 5 = conversion of currency (pi-_(account)CurrencyOld,pi-_(account)CurrencyNew) 6 = conversion of advisor(and userid) (pi-_userOld,pi-_userNew) 7 = conversion of trading system (pi-_tradingSystemOld,pi-_tradingSystemNew) */

/* 1 = conversion of relations (pi-_relationNumberOld,pi-_relationNumberNew) 2 = conversion of accounts (pi-_relationNumberOld,pi-_accountOld,pi-_accountNew,pi-_accountTypeOld,pi-_(account)CurrencyOld) 3 = conversion of acting as (pi-_actingAsOld,pi-_actingAsNew) 4 = conversion of accountType (pi-_relationNumberOld,pi-_relationNumberNew,pi-_accountOld,pi-_accountTypeOld,pi-_accountTypeNew,pi-_(account)CurrencyOld) 5 = conversion of currency (pi-_(account)CurrencyOld,pi-_(account)CurrencyNew) 6 = conversion of advisor(and userid) (pi-_userOld,pi-_userNew) 7 = conversion of trading system (pi-_tradingSystemOld,pi-_tradingSystemNew) 8 = conversion of instrument symbol, reference symbol and fraction symbol (pi-_symbolOld, pi-_symbolNew 9= relation splitting) */

Text.val: CND No om de namen van de kolommen op te kunnen halen
ActingAs will be handled in the update task(rb723)
TradingSystem will be handled in the update task(oa411)

Comment.val: /*Convert relation numbers of transactions belonging to a specific product. The product is identified by the old account id.*/

Text.val: In order to prevent a 'ORA-01002 : fetch out of sequence' Error, there isn't a range on 'TRAI_TR_CL_ID' with the old
CL_ID, because this column is updated in de RS.
Only update if the update hasn't been done before :
